altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

altTitles.th: Again ย้อนเวลากลับมาป่วน

altTitles.ja: アゲイン！！

description.en: After three unfulfilling years of high school, Imamura Kinichirou was finally graduating. Because of his delinquent-esque looks, he was feared by his classmates, has made no friends, and his greatest regret was not joining the ouendan (cheer club), which was now disbanded. After an accident on the day of his graduation, he and classmate Fujieda Aki are transported three years back in time, freshman again in body but with high-school memories intact. Can Imamura fix the mistakes of his past? Can he re-do his high school years in the way that he's always wanted? Again!! The universe suddenly shouts.

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝花のチハル

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The classic look, and a presence backed by an overwhelming sentimentality!　

The shocking story of Chiharu Shiba, the leader of a suicide squad of Bozozoku, is depicted in this work!
description.pt-br: Baki Gaiden: Hana no Chiharu abre como uma nova história na série Baki. A história se foca em Chiharu Shiba, o segundo capitão suicida da gangue de motociclistas Gandamashi Bomba. É uma história sobre um homem com coragem e seus modos de luta.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---

- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

A Mouthful of My Beautiful Master's Milk Is Unequalled in the Whole World
A Mouthful of My Loli Master's Milk Is Unequalled in the Whole World

萝莉师父奶我一口天下无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Loli Shifu Nai Wo Yi Kou Tian Xia Wu Di

description.en: "Traveling through another world with a system, I thought I could be unparalleled, but I didn't know that if I wanted to upgrade this damn system, I would need to be beaten up constantly. Just when I was about to go crazy under the beatings of countless people, a loli appeared and domineeringly said that she wanted to accept me as a disciple. Hmph, facing the temptation of the loli, I agreed. Haha, after all, she will grow up one day. It's just I didn't know that she would grow up so fast..."
description.zh: 带着系统穿越异界，本以为可以作威作福，却没想到，想要让这该死的系统升级，我需要不停的挨揍。 就在我准备在无数人的毒打中猥琐发育下去的时候，一只小萝莉出现了，还霸气的说要收我为徒。 哼，面对这种萝莉的诱惑，我必须同意，哈哈，毕竟总有一天会长大的嘛。只是我不知道，她长得居然那么快……

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

title.en: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village

altTitles.ja-ro: Fushi no Kami ~Henkyou kara Hajimeru Bunmei Saiseiki~

altTitles.ja: フシノカミ～辺境から始める文明再生記～

description.en: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief’s daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!

altTitles.ja: クオーツの王国

description.en: "Angels"... are heroes who follow the will of the Goddess and protect the Quartz Kingdom from demons. Blue, an orphan born with dark wings, lives a peaceful life, dreaming of becoming an angel. But one day, after meeting a prince, her destiny begins to change.
description.ru: «Ангелы»... это герои, следующие воле Богини и защищающие Кварцевое Королевство от демонов. Блю, сирота, родившаяся с тёмными крыльями, живет мирной жизнью, мечтая стать ангелом. Но в один день, после встречи с принцем, её судьба начинает меняться.
description.es-la:
«Ángeles»… Aquellos que han heredado la voluntad de la diosa serán los héroes que protegerán al Reino del Cuarzo de los demonios. 

En estos pacíficos días una huérfana llamada Blue que nació portando alas negras, sueña con convertirse en un ángel. Sin embargo cierto día su destino cambiará luego de encontrarse con cierto príncipe.

description.en:
Han Kang, a famous and recognizable male protagonist, goes through a lifelong event to attempt to debut as a celebrity while caring for a child that he's unaware of.  
  
- [Raw Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EB%8C%80%EB%94%94%EB%B3%B4%EC%9D%B4/51761556)

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Maken Tsukai no Moto Shounen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Makendzukai no Moto Shounenhei wa, Moto Tekikanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai
Maken Tsukai no Moto Shōnen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onēsan to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja: 魔剣使いの元少年兵は、元敵幹部のお姉さんと一緒に生きたい

altTitles.en: A Former Child Soldier Who Uses a Magic Sword Wants to Live With a Missy, the Former Enemy Leader

altTitles.id: Seorang Mantan Prajurit Laki-laki Pengguna Pedang Sakti, Ingin Tinggal Bersama Mbak-Mbak yang Mantan Pemimpin Musuh

altTitles.zh: 魔王女干部X勇者少年兵

altTitles.es-la: Un antiguo niño soldado con una espada mágica quiere vivir con su hermana, una antigua líder enemiga.

description.en:
Seto is an ex-boy soldier who was expelled from the party of heroes on his journey because of his ruthless and incomparable fighting style. The former leader of the Demon King's army, Satis, was kicked out after a series of failures.

The two "former" enemies decide to travel together to find a second life. Sometimes they go to hot springs, sometimes they sleep in the same bed, sometimes they are attacked by demons. But what do they find at the end of their journey when they lose their place in the world?

The road story of the (former) brave boy soldier and (former) demon lord's army leader's "rebirth"!
description.ja: 冷酷無比な戦いぶりを疎まれ、旅の途中で勇者パーティを追放された魔剣使いの元少年兵・セト。失敗続きで魔王軍を追い出された元幹部・サティス。“元”敵同士のふたりが第二の人生を探すため一緒に旅に出る。時には温泉に行ったり、一緒のベッドで寝たり――居場所を失くしたもの同士の“生き直し"ロードストーリー！
description.es-la: Seto es un ex-soldado que fue expulsado del grupo de héroes en su viaje debido a su despiadado e incomparable estilo de lucha. El antiguo líder del ejército del Rey Demonio, Satis, fue expulsado tras una serie de fracasos. Los dos "antiguos" enemigos emprenden juntos un viaje para encontrar una segunda vida. A veces van a las termas, a veces duermen en la misma cama... ¡Una historia de "renacimiento" para los que han perdido su lugar en el mundo!
description.pt-br:
"Seto é um ex-garoto soldado que foi expulso do grupo dos heróis em sua jornada por causa de seu estilo de luta impiedoso e incomparável. A ex-líder do exército do Rei Demônio, Satis, foi expulsa após uma série de fracassos.

Os dois "antes" inimigos decidem viajar juntos para encontrar uma segunda vida. Às vezes eles vão para fontes termais, às vezes dormem na mesma cama, às vezes são atacados por demônios. Mas o que eles encontram no final de sua viagem quando perdem seu lugar no mundo?

A história do "renascimento" do "antigo" herói e da antiga líder do exército do rei demônio!

altTitles.ja: 痛いんです

description.en:
What level of pain can you tolerate? Is it 1? Or is it 6? Let’s go to the theme park of pain…

A collection of painful events that people have experienced sorted in the “Pain Level Scale”, from 1 to 6.


Note: Sukima.me lists there being 23 chapters because they merged 3 and 4. There are 24 chapters.

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.ja: 魔道祖師

description.en:
The Japanese manga adaptation of the mega-hit Chinese fantasy novel "The Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation", which was officially published in English by Seven Seas Entertainment.

As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei Wuxian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan Wangji, his archenemy.

This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei Wuxian slowly realizes that Lan Wangji, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei Wuxian than he is letting on.

altTitles.ja: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双

description.en:
A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

altTitles.ja: マンオブラスト

description.en:
The "sixth sense" is the ability to perceive the providence of nature with one's "mind" and transform it into "power".

The "Falling World" at the bottom of the earth.

One day, Ruo, a boy who dreams of the skies, comes into possession of "relic iron," the carcass of Tetsuzin, a monster from the earth. However, it is a forbidden power that must not be touched! The goal is to go to the ground.

The "super-royalistic boys' manga" in which a "rokudenashi" changes the world is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

description.en: Special one-shot series of the popular Ao Ashi football manga focusing on Taira Nakamura and his love for cooking.

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

altTitles.ja: スラム　ダンク
スラムダンク

description.en:
Winning isn't everything in the game of basketball, but who wants to come in second? It takes dedication and discipline to be the best, and the Shohoku High hoops team wants to be just that. They have one last year to make their captain's dream of reaching the finals come true–will they do it? Takehiko Inoue's legendary beloved basketball manga is finally here and the tale of a lifetime is in your hands.  
  
Hanamichi Sakuragi's got no game with girls—none at all! It doesn't help that he's known for throwing down at a moment's notice and always coming out on top. A hopeless bruiser, he's been rejected by 50 girls in a row! All that changes when he meets the girl of his dreams, Haruko, and she's actually not afraid of him! When she introduces him to the game of basketball, his life is changed forever…  
  
Note: Includes a one-shot called 10 Days After. 

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/slam-dunk) 

---
  
- **Won the 40th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen In 1995**
- **One of top 10 highest selling Manga in history, with over 170 Million copies sold as of 2017**
- **In 2010, Inoue received special commendations from the Japan Basketball Association (JBA) for his contributions to the sport**
description.pt-br: Slam Dunk traz a história de Hanamichi Sakuragi, um estudante do colegial delinquente apaixonado pela delicada Haruko Akagi, que o introduz ao mundo do basquete. A partir daí, o desajeitado personagem começa a se envolver no esporte, em fazer parte de uma equipe e a se desenvolver como atleta e pessoa.

description.en: Tang Ran is a sunny and cheerful little fox. In order to graduate from the monster school, she transformed into a human college student and wanted to seduce a human to fall in love with her. However, what she didn't know was that the cold-hearted human female professor she fell in love with, Su Qingci, was actually...? A lie requires countless other lies to cover it up. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox will always tell "lies".

The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

altTitles.en: Onee-san is into Elementary School Girls

From the mangaka of Hshs Sasero!!, the comedic story about a high school teacher, who happens to be a lolicon, and the girl she babysits with her roommate!

title.en: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

altTitles.th: เลดี้กับท่านชายอสูร

altTitles.ja: 彼女と野獣

description.de:
Nach einem Leben voller Blutvergießen und Kummer wird die große Kaiserin Martina wiedergeboren als Astina, geniale Tochter eines bescheidenen Grafen. Aber ihre friedliche Welt zerbricht, als der Bankrott der Familie ihren Vater dazu zwingt, sie an den gefährlichen Erzherzog Atalenta zu verheiraten. Dieser ist in der feinen Gesellschaft bekannt als „Terriod die Bestie“, weil er durch einen Familienfluch in ein wildes Monster verwandelt wurde. Glücklicherweise ist selbst die tödliche Bestie von Atalenta dem mächtigen Schwert der ehemaligen Kaiserin nicht gewachsen. Alle sind geschockt, als die neue Erzherzogin ihren Ehemann kurzerhand zähmt und zum Familienoberhaupt wird. Niemand ist jedoch mehr überrascht als Astina selbst, als ein einfacher Kuss Terriod zurück in einen Menschen verwandelt. Er ähnelt nicht nur ihrem Liebhaber aus ihrem vergangenen Leben, sondern hat auch noch keinerlei Erinnerungen an sie von seiner Zeit als Bestie. Kann sich dieses mächtige Paar trotz der unangenehmen Umstände zusammentun und über das Erzherzogtum herrschen?

---

description.en:
100 years after her death, Empress Martina, the founder of the Carabella Empire, reincarnates as Astina Lette, the daughter of a count. Her peaceful, everyday life as a noble lady, a stark contrast to her past life, is short-lived, however.

With the bankruptcy of her father's failed trade business, her family falls into great debt. Astina decides to sell herself off to marry Grand Duke Thereode in place of her sister Kanna to save her family from their financial crisis. But Thereode is forever cursed to take on the form of a beast, and no one expects her to survive the night with him…

Still, defying all odds, she fights the beast with her impressive swordsmanship, and miraculously survives. Over time, a slow relationship begins to kindle between them as she tames him as her pet.

---
Following a life of bloodshed and heartbreak, the great Empress Martina is reborn as Astina, the genius daughter of a humble count. But her peaceful world is shattered when bankruptcy forces her father to marry her off to the dangerous Archduke Atalenta. All of high society knows him as "Theriod the Beast" because of a family curse that turned him into a wild monster. Luckily, even the deadly beast of Atalenta is no match for the former empress's mighty sword. 

Everyone is shocked when the new archduchess tames her husband all too easily and takes over as the family head. No one's more surprised than Astina, however, when her casual kiss returns Theriod to his human form. Not only does he resemble her past life lover, but he has no memory of her from his wolf days. Despite these awkward circumstances, can the new power couple join hands to rule over the archduchy?

---

description.fr:
Après une vie ponctuée de massacres et de trahisons, l'impératrice Martina se réincarne dans le corps d'Astina, de longues années plus tard. Seulement, cette fois aussi, sa vie ne sera pas de tout repos, puisqu'après que leur père a fait faillite, la sœur d'Astina est mariée de force à l'archiduc Atalenta, un homme victime d'une terrible malédiction le transformant en monstre. Astina décide alors de prendre la place de la jeune Kanna, et affronte sans mal la bête terrifiante qu'est devenu l'archiduc. Elle n'en reste pas moins surprise d'arriver à gérer la situation avec tant de facilité, et l'est encore plus lorsqu'un simple baiser de sa part finit par rendre son apparence à l'archiduc, qui en plus de ressembler étrangement à l'homme donc Martina était amoureuse, n'a plus aucun souvenir d'elle lorsqu'il était un loup. Malgré cette situation on ne peut plus étrange, vont-ils réussir à maintenir l'ordre dans le duché et à régner main dans la main?

---

description.ko:
제국의 시조였던 전설적인 인물 마티나의 죽음으로부터 백 년 후,
마티나는 귀족가의 일개 여식인 아스티나로 환생한다.

전생과 다른 평화로운 일상은 잠시,
아버지의 파산으로 인해 아스티나는
야수의 형상을 한 테리오드 대공에게로 팔려 간다.

“급소를 쳐서 기절시켰어요.”
“기…… 절시키셨다고요?”

하룻밤에 죽어 나갈 것이라는 모두의 예상과 달리
그녀는 화려한 검술로 괴물 테리오드를 제압해
애완동물로 길들이기 시작한다.

“테오, 앉아.”
“컹!”

달빛이 아름다운 어느 밤,
자신을 잘 따르는 테리오드가 기특해
아스티나는 그에게 짧게 입을 맞춰 주는데……

“……테오?”

아스티나의 애완동물이……
사람이 됐다?

결핍된 괴물 남편과 무심한 아내의 본격 조련 로맨스!

---

description.ru:
Спустя сотню лет после смерти Мартины — основательницы империи, легенда переродилась в теле Астины — одной из дочерей аристократической семьи. Ее мирная повседневная жизнь, так отличавшаяся от предыдущей, оборвалась в тот миг, когда обанкротившийся отец продал ее звероподобному эрцгерцогу Териоту. Но вопреки многочисленным ожиданиям, что девушка, встретившись с чудовищем, в одночасье погибнет, благодаря своему исключительному мастерству владения мечом Астина победила монстра и приручила его, словно домашнего питомца…

description.uk:
Через 100 років після смерті, імператриця Мартіна, засновниця імперії Карабелла, перевтілюється в Астіну Летте, дочку графа. Однак її мирне повсякденне життя благородної дами, що різко контрастує з її минулим життям, є недовгим.

Після банкрутства невдалого торгового бізнесу її батька, її родина потрапляє у великі борги. Астіна вирішує продати себе, щоб вийти заміж за великого герцога Тереоду, замість своєї сестри Канни, щоб врятувати свою сім'ю від фінансової кризи. Але Тереода назавжди проклятий мати образ звіра, і ніхто не очікує, що вона переживе ніч з ним...

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントお嬢様

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

altTitles.ja: Angel Beats! スピンオフ!!　旅する天使ちゃん

description.en: Kanade Tachibana is a cute girl who is called "Tenshi-chan" at school. She traveled all over the country in search of "someone". During her travels, when she stops by Kanagawa, she meets Yuri Nakamura, a lively and cheerful girl. People who look a lot like SSS members also appear on the road!? Will Angel be able to find "a certain person"...?
description.vi:
Đây là một spin-off của "Angel Beats!".

Tachibana Kanade là một cô gái xinh xắn được các bạn ở trường gọi là "Thiên sứ-chan". Cô đang du hành xuyên Nhật Bản để tìm kiếm "một ai đó". Dọc đường, khi đi ngang qua Kanagawa, cô gặp một cô nàng năng nổ và vui tính tên Nakamura Yuri.

Những người giống hệt các thành viên của chiến tuyến SSS cũng sẽ xuất hiện trong chuyến du hành của Thiên sứ-chan. Liệu cuối cùng cô sẽ có thể tao ngộ cùng "ai đó"?

title.en: Ghoul ga Sekai wo Sukutta Koto wo Watashi dake ga shitteiru

altTitles.ja: グールが世界を救ったことを私だけが知っている

altTitles.en: Only I Know the Ghoul Saved the World

description.en:
“I’m not a hero. I’m a monster that devours monsters.” In a chaotic world where ferocious monsters run rampant, there was a “monster” who inherited the title of “hero” in the holy city, the last bastion of humanity on the brink of extinction. Alice, a rookie adventurer, was attacked by a large pack of dog people (Kobolds) during her first ‘dungeon’ exploration. The one who saved her life was Leon, the third-generation “Savior” hero, who, despite having the body of a monster (Ghoul), possesses a human heart.

“I’m nothing but a defiled ghoul who keeps on killing monsters.”

“No, you’re the only hero who can save the world.”

For some reason, Alice, who admires him, applies to become Leon’s disciple.

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
description.mn:
Өвдөлтийн мэдрэмж 0, Барих хувь 100!
Виртуал ертөнцийн тоглоомны өвдөлтийн мэдрэмжийн тохиргоог "0" болгосон. Би бүх төгсгөлийг нь дуусгасан цор ганц, тиймээс энэ бол миний 100 дахь оролдлого...гэхдээ сонин байна. Гэнэтхэн, эмчлэгдхээргүй өвчинтэй, бас гол дүрүүд миний төлөө санаа зовж эхэлсэн.
"Би ямар ч өвдөлт мэдрэхгүй болохоор, дүр эсгэх нь зөв юм болов уу?"
Намайг мэдхээс өмнө, энэ гол дүрүүдэд би энэ дэлхийн амар амгалангийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох баатар болчихсон байсан. Одоо өнгөрснөөс хойш, энэ оролдлогын концепц бол энэ ертөнцийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох! Би заавал аз жаргалтай төгсөх хэрэгтэй. Энэ бол миний сүүлчийн оролдлого!

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: I, a Level 9999 Blacksmith Who Was Told That "Blacksmithing Is Suitable for a Small Fry lololol" Was Expelled From the Guild, so I Changed My Job to an Adventurer - I Will Live Happily in the Guild While being Unrivaled with the Strongest Weapons!

altTitles.ja: 「雑魚には鍛冶がお似合いだwww」と言われた鍛冶レベル9999の俺、追放されたので冒険者に転職する ～最強武器で無双しながらギルドで楽しく暮らします～

altTitles.ja-ro: "Zako ni wa Kaji ga Oniai da www" to Iwareta Kaji Level 9999 no Ore, Tsuihousareta no de Boukensha ni Tenshokusuru Saikyou Buki de Musou Shinagara Guild de Tanoshiku Kurashimasu

description.en: Makina, a blacksmith who worked in the renowned guild “Silver Wings,” is expelled from his guild. The reason? Guild members who don’t value their weapons believed it was more cost-effective to buy them rather than employ his services. Lost and uncertain about his future, Makina receives an invitation from his childhood friend and adventurer, Aria. He joins Aria’s guild, “Rainbow Butterflies.” It’s here that Makina’s blacksmithing talents truly shine. With his weapons in the hands of guild members, they collectively rise to become the mightiest of all.
description.ja:
「武器を弄るだけの奴をは認めねぇ」
武器使いの荒いメンバーたちのため、常に武器を鍛え続けていたにもかかわらず、突然理不尽な理由でギルド『白銀の翼』を追放されてしまった鍛冶師マキナ。途方に暮れ街を彷徨うマキナだったが、偶然ごろつきたちに襲われる幼馴染のアリアを発見する。すぐに愛剣イフリートで彼女を助け出すと、事情を知った彼女から、所属する新興ギルド『虹の蝶』への冒険者としての加入を勧められる。そこで類稀なる鍛冶スキルを発揮したマキナは、彼の作るチート級武器を手にした仲間たちと共に、最強のギルドを目指して無双する!!

altTitles.th: นักเรียนพี่เลี้ยงเด็ก

altTitles.ja: 学園ベビーシッターズ

description.en: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
description.pt: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.
description.pt-br: Após perderem os pais em um acidente de avião os irmãos Kotarou e Ryuuichi são mandados para o colégio Morinomiya, lá eles precisam trabalhar na creche para poder manter sua estadia.

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

description.en: "O, Hero!", with that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure -did not begin. After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.
description.ja:
異世界に突如として勇者召喚された相馬一也。だが、彼の“勇者”としての冒険は――始まらなかった。国王から国家の抱える危機と課題を聞き出した彼は、持ち前の現代の知識を活かし富国強兵策を提案。すると……「召喚されし勇者ソーマ・カズヤに王位を譲る！」なんと、あろうことか国王より譲位されてしまう。さらに王女をソーマの婚約者にすると発表され――!?

若き国王ソーマと腹心の仲間とが共に国家の再興を目指す異世界本格内政ファンタジー開幕！

description.en: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
description.ja:
かつて勇者と共に世界を闇に沈めた魔王を討伐した英雄、賢者ドワイト。
しかし、その力から次代の魔王になるつもりだと無実の罪を着せられ、
死者の谷へ落とされ命を落とす…。
しかし、肉が腐り落ちるも、この世への執念からスケルトンとして
生き永らえていたドワイトは、この間違った世界を否定する事を誓い、
かつての魔王をも凌駕する力で無数のアンデッドを率い、侵略戦争を開始する…！

---
- [Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0651fj)
description.pt-br:
O Sábio Dwight, ele junto com o Herói derrotou o Lorde Demônio que afundou o mundo na escuridão. No entanto, eles foram falsamente acusados ​​de se tornarem os próximos Lordes Demônios por causa de seu poder, e foram jogados no Vale dos Mortos para morrer…

Mas embora sua carne tenha apodrecido, 
ele vive como um esqueleto por causa de seu rancor contra o mundo. Dwight jurou negar esse mundo errado, e com um poder que supera até mesmo o Rei Demônio do passado, e também liderando incontáveis ​​esqueletos. ele vai começar uma guerra total...!

description.en:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
description.hu: Hestia, a főhősnőnk a kedvenc regényének egy gazdag mellékszereplőjeként ébred egy nap. Rajongóként legelső dolga, hogy nemesi címet vásároljon magának annak érdekében, hogy az imádott drágaságát, a regény second male lead-jét, Caelust láthassa az arisztokrata bálokon. Hestia úgy dönt, csak külső szemlélő lesz, nem avatkozik bele a cselekményszálba. A regény eredeti befejezését követő évben azonban olyan váratlan dolog történik Caelus-szal, ami Hestiát mégis cselekvésre készteti, hogy a bias-a elkerülhesse a tragikus befejezést.1
description.ko:
"내 최애를 살려내!"
N회차 정주행할 만큼 애정하던 로판 소설에 빙의한 헤스티아,
엑스트라 of 엑스트라에 빙의한 덕에 주인공들을 직관하고 드디어 맞이한 작품의 엔딩!
엔딩 후 현실로 돌아가게 될 거란 예상은 산산조각이 나고,
소설의 엔딩 후 비하인드가 가장 애정하는 캐릭터였던 서브남 카엘루스의 죽음이라는 충격에서 벗어나기도 전에
소설의 엔딩 직후로 회귀하는데…!
그렇다면 이번엔, 내 최애를 지켜내겠어!

description.en:
Summoned to purify the corruption spreading across Arad...?

Jinseong, a player who dedicated his life to "Dungeon & Fighter," is summoned to Arad by the transcendent Nemer and given the mission of becoming the Claw Master.

“You shall become the Claw Master and guide the blade through rightful trials.”

"I'll become the Claw Master or whatever it takes. I will survive in this Arad!"

Will DFO veteran Jinseong successfully complete his mission and return to the real world? The story of the Dark Knight Jinseong's quest to prevent the destruction of Arad begins!

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

description.en:
The story of how the girl of my dreams was a stalker.

Manga by Twitter user @ku-sunok1
description.es-la: Manga del usuario de Twitter @ku_sunok1, el título es también sinopsis.

title.en: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter

altTitles.en: The Sagacious Cleaning Life of a Returned Genius Hunter

altTitles.ru: Мудрая уборка жизни вернувшегося охотника за гениями

altTitles.en: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter

description.en:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.
description.fr:
Kim Jun-Woo, le premier chasseur de génie de rang SSS au monde.

Il est un utilisateur incroyable de capacité, mais sa personnalité horrible conduit à des problèmes avec sa réputation.

Au milieu de ses problèmes, il a été attaqué et tué par un groupe non identifié.

Quand il a ouvert les yeux, il était retourné dans le passé, il y a 10 ans.

Bien qu’il essaie de redevenir un chasseur et d’élever son rang, ses compétences ont toutes été scellées par le karma de sa vie antérieure.

Pour le libérer, il doit travailler comme « nettoyeur de donjon », un métier réputé pour être extrêmement dur dans cette industrie !

Mais ce nettoyeur, il est différent !
description.ko:
세계 최초 SSS랭크 천재 헌터 김준우.
대단한 능력자지만, 인정머리가 없는 탓에 평판에 문제가 생긴다.
골머리를 썩히고 있는 와중, 정체를 알 수 없는 집단에게 습격받아 죽게 되고,
눈을 떠보니 10년 전 시점으로 회귀한 상태.

다시 헌터가 되어 랭크를 올리려 했지만, 이전 생의 업보로 인해 스킬을 모두 봉인 당하고,
해제를 위해서는 업계에선 극한 직업으로 유명한 '던전 청소부'로 일을 해야 하는데?!

하지만 이 청소부, 남다르다!
몬스터는 물론이거니와, 골깝떠는 헌터, 자리만 차지하는 낙하산 상사, 심지어 동료가 될 사람까지
모든 걸 청소할 기세로 깽판을 치는데...

현직 헌터보다 더 강한 전직 헌터의 망나니식 청소가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Kim Jun-woo, o primeiro caçador genial de rank SSS.

Ele é um incrível usuário de habilidades, mas sua personalidade horrível trás problemas para sua reputação.

No meio de seus problemas, ele foi atacado e morto por um grupo não identificado. E quando abriu os olhos, havia retornado 10 anos para seu passado.

Embora ele tente voltar a ser um caçador e aumentar seu rank, as habilidades dele foram seladas pelo karma de sua vida passada.

Para conseguir libertar suas habilidades, ele precisa trabalhar como um “Limpador de Dungeons”, que tem a fama de ser incrivelmente difícil! Mas esse faxineiro, ele é diferente!

Não apenas monstros – caçadores problemáticos, superiores conseguindo suas posições por puro nepotismo, e até mesmo seus colegas.

Ele está fazendo a maior bagunça para limpar tudo. O ex-caçador, que é mais forte do que os caçadores atuais, e sua limpeza maluca vão começar!

altTitles.ja: AISHA 愛と殺戮の童話

description.en: The twins who have lost both their mother and father had got their humongous inheritance stolen by their evil stepmother. The three sons of their stepmother have a special relationship towards their non-biological sisters. Thus, a scene of love, love and hate occurred in this old mansion. This is a fairy tale of romance and vengeance.
